trans-unit.source: Represents a control for viewing flow content in a fixed viewing mode that shows content one page at a time.
trans-unit.target: 代表在固定檢視模式 (一次顯示一頁內容) 中檢視動態內容的控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> allows only one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> as a child element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> 不允許只有<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>做為子項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> 顯示內容頁-一次檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: A similar control, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, shows content in continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: 類似的控制項， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>，會顯示在連續捲動模式中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> are fixed to a particular viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>會固定為特定檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> enumeration), at the cost of being poorer performing than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>包含可讓使用者以動態方式選擇各種不同的檢視模式的功能 (所提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>列舉型別)，但要付出正在差執行比<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>控制項，其預設值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer")
trans-unit.target: ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentPageViewer")

trans-unit.source: **Content Area** - The content area displays the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **內容區域**-內容區域顯示的內容<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>所指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: **Toolbar** - The default toolbar is docked underneath the content area, and hosts controls for navigating pages, and changing the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: **工具列**-預設工具列停駐在下方內容區域中，主機及巡覽頁面，以及變更的縮放層級的控制項。

trans-unit.source: **Page Navigation Controls** - The page navigation controls include a button to jump to the next page (the down arrow) or previous page (the up arrow), as well as indicators for the current page number and total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: **頁面導覽控制項**-頁面導覽控制項包括按鈕，以跳至下一個頁面 （向下箭號） 或前一頁 （向上箭頭），以及目前的頁碼和總頁數的指示器。

trans-unit.source: **Zoom Controls** - The zoom controls enable the user to increase or decrease the zoom level by clicking the plus or minus buttons, respectively.
trans-unit.target: **縮放控制項**-縮放控制項可讓使用者以增加或減少縮放層級，按一下加號或減號按鈕分別。

trans-unit.source: The zoom controls also include a slider for adjusting the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 縮放控制項也包括調整縮放層級的滑桿。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader.Zoom%2A>。

trans-unit.source: **Search** - The user can use the Ctr+F keyboard shortcut or you can use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A> to toggle a search textbox that is used to find strings within the content.
trans-unit.target: **搜尋**-使用者可以使用 Ctr + F 鍵盤快速鍵，或您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A>切換搜尋文字方塊中，用來尋找在內容中的字串。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Find%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> pictured in the figure above.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>上圖中所示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> level can be decreased.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否可降低 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> 層級。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> level can be decreased; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以降低 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> 層級則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A> method decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>方法減少<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>層級所指定的數量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值的值受限於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>，您需要此金鑰，才能設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoomPropertyKey> as the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>，並傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoomPropertyKey>為`key`參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> level can be increased.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否可提高 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> 層級。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> level can be increased; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以提高 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> 層級則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A> method increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>方法增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>層級所指定的數量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值的值受限於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>，您需要此金鑰，才能設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoomPropertyKey> as the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>，並傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoomPropertyKey>為`key`參數。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom" /> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom" /> 傳送的命令。

trans-unit.source: This method decreases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會減少目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>層級所指定的值由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a button to decrease the zoom.
trans-unit.target: 預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包含要減少縮放 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>屬性會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Toggles the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 切換 [尋找] 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，Ctrl + F 會提供鍵盤快速鍵來切換**尋找**對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> with default UI.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示**尋找**對話<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>UI 的預設值。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer")
trans-unit.target: ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentPageViewer 的尋找對話方塊](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentPageViewer 的尋找對話方塊")

trans-unit.source: The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值**尋找**對話方塊包含讓您輸入搜尋文字欄位，以及按鈕**找下一個**，**找上一個**，和**選項**.

trans-unit.source: The following **Find** options are provided by default:
trans-unit.target: 下列**尋找**預設會提供選項：

trans-unit.source: Match whole word only
trans-unit.target: 全字拼寫須相符

trans-unit.source: Match case
trans-unit.target: 大小寫須相符

trans-unit.source: Match diacritic
trans-unit.target: 比對讀音符號

trans-unit.source: Match kashida
trans-unit.target: 比對 kashida

trans-unit.source: Match alef hamza
trans-unit.target: 比對引 hamza

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom" /> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom" /> 傳送的命令。

trans-unit.source: This method increases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會增加目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>層級所指定的值由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a button to increase the zoom.
trans-unit.target: 預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包含以增加縮放 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>屬性會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> displays selected text when the control does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 是否會在控制項沒有焦點時，顯示選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> displays selected text when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> does not have focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 沒有焦點時，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" />會顯示選取的文字，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IsInactiveSelectionHighlightEnabled" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IsInactiveSelectionHighlightEnabled" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> has focus and selected text.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 是否擁有焦點和選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> displays selected text when the text box does not have focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在文字方塊沒有焦點時，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 會顯示選取的文字，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IsSelectionActive" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.IsSelectionActive" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum allowable <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> level for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> 之允許的最大 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 層級。

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable zoom level for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" />, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 可允許的最大縮放層級 (以百分比表示)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 200.0 (a maximum zoom of 200%).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 200.0 (縮放層級上限 200%)。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a slider that can be used to adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包含可用來調整滑桿<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>層級。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the upper-limit value for the slider.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性指定滑桿的上限值。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowable <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> level for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> 之允許的最小 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 層級。

trans-unit.source: The minimum allowable zoom level for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" />, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 可允許的最小縮放層級 (以百分比表示)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 80.0 (a minimum zoom of 80%).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 80.0 (縮放層級下限 80%)。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a slider that can be used to adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包含可用來調整滑桿<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>層級。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the lower-limit value for the slider.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性指定滑桿的下限值。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint%2A>指令呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的引數。

trans-unit.source: Called whenever an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 每當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening" /> 路由事件達到其路由中的這個類別時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 萬一中繼類別繼承中的已實作此方法，您仍應該呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是有點像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 它會提供方法來處理來自衍生類別的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式的比對事件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，則相符的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event might have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能已引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式，因此您的實作必須接受事件引數的項目考量來源屬性 （和不應嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> could call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子類別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>路由收到事件時，無法呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 一個可能的情況是取用事件的引數，並謹慎地將事件標示為已處理。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供這個控制項適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 實作，做為 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 自動化基礎結構的一部分。

trans-unit.target: 適用於這個控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得選取之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 的內容。

trans-unit.source: The selected content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: 選取之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 的內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Selection%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Selection%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the text that a user has selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得使用者選取中的文字<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定會反白顯示選取之文字的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: A brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 反白顯示選取之文字的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the brush that highlights selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> properties..
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定會反白顯示所選取的文字的筆刷<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>屬性...

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> property to pink, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> property to 0.7.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>屬性設為粉紅色，並設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>0.7 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush" /> 的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The opacity of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush" /> 的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.4.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 0.4。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is transparent and is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>為 0，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>透明，看不到。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> to 1.0 or greater, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is opaque and the selected text is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>為 1.0 或更高，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>是不透明，而且所選取文字不可見。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> property to pink, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> property to 0.7.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>屬性設為粉紅色，並設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>0.7 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.SelectionOpacity" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current zoom level for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> 目前的縮放層級。

trans-unit.source: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 目前的縮放層級 (以百分比表示)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 100.0 (縮放層級 100%)。

trans-unit.source: The zoom level is constrained by the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 縮放層級由的值限制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MinZoom%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.MaxZoom%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zoom increment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定縮放增量。

trans-unit.source: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 目前的縮放增量 (以百分比表示)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10.0 (縮放增量 10%)。

trans-unit.source: The zoom increment is the percentage by which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A> level is increased or decreased when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> commands are executed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 顯示比例增量是百分比<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom%2A>層級會增加或減少時<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>執行命令，分別。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.ZoomIncrement" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer.Zoom" /> 相依性屬性。
